channel.title: [PI] Shop Help
channel.description:
Hey, I am running a server that is a PI and am having a problem. Everytime I add shops they are there and all but when I a buy from them it doesn't work. Than, I click value, and it says this item costs 0 points. It is not pk points or any other form of points in the server. This is driving me crazy!!!! :mad: I was hoping one of you can help me as it causes lots of problems and I cannot add shops so people cant recieve basic items such as iron scimmy. :(
If anybody can help please reply ASAP. My server with the problem is online and you will be treated well on it if you can help me fix this problem. Thanks!

item.title: [PI] Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Shadow_I1 I Shadow I1
item.description:
@I_Shadow_I1 wrote:

It’s most likely the source change the source.

Read full topic
